### Assessment of Controls and ICFM Consulting Services

#### Request for Proposal

**Reference:** PW-22-01009496, Amendment 1

**Solicitation Number:** 100020720/B

**Publication Date:** October 7, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** November 16, 2022, 2:00 PM ET

### Background

The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to assess the effectiveness of Employment and Social Development Canada's (ESDC) system of Internal Control over Financial Management (ICFM) and to provide consulting services related to ICFM and multi-year monitoring.

### Scope of Work

The selected supplier will provide professional services to the internal control team to assist with the on-going monitoring of the department's system of ICFM on an as and when requested basis.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit (70%) and Price (30%).

### Security Requirements

The supplier must hold a valid facility security clearance at the level of Secret, with approved document safeguarding at the level of Secret, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP). Personnel requiring access to protected/classified information must hold a valid personnel security screening at the level of Reliability Status or Secret.

### Proposal Requirements

Please submit your proposal electronically to the TBS Buying Centre by the closing date. Further information and instructions can be found on the Buy and Sell website.

### Contract Award

The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the highest combined rating, and the contract will be for the contract award date until August 31, 2023, with up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications, please contact Yves Cormier at yves.cormier@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca.

---

### Regions of Opportunity

* National Capital Region (NCR)

### Note

This RFP is open to pre-qualified suppliers for Stream 6: Financial Accounting Services against Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement (E60ZQ-180001). Only the information provided in this document is relevant to the solicitation. Proposal amendments must be submitted electronically through the BidBrige Module.  -- [ET transmission]
